All Classes

Class Description
Address
Represents address (of sender or recipient)
Branch
Represents a local branch
buttonsPanel
Panel of all system buttons
CareTaker
Represents a class that keeps all the mementos memory
Customer
Represents a customer that creates packages to deliver
Dialog
The dialog of choosing the system details
Number of branches, How many trucks for each branch, Number of packages.
Game
A driver for the game
Hub
Represents a sorting center
MainOffice
Manages the entire system, operates a clock, branches and vehicles, creates packages and transfers them to the appropriate branches.
Memento
Represents memento that keeps a state
Node
Represents a location (vehicle or branch)
NonStandardPackage
Represents a package with non standard size
A non standard package is a Package with a specific width, length and height
NonStandardTruck
Represents a vehicle for transferring packages from the sorting center to branches and back
Carry only NonStandardPackage
Only one package per trip.
Package
Represents a package
Priority
Priority list
Simulator
Manage the whole simulator system
SimulatorPanel
Manage the whole graphical system
SmallPackage
Represents a small package
A small package is a package that weighs only one unit
StandardPackage
Represents a package with varying weights over one unit
StandardTruck
Represents a vehicle that used for delivering small packages and standard packages Transfer many packages per trip. Collects only SmallPackage and StandardPackage. Got a weight limit.
State
Represents a state to keep and return later
Status
List of statuses corresponding to the delivery stages
Tracking
A record in the package transfer history
trackingDisplay  
Truck
Represents a vehicle that used for delivering packages.
Van
Represents a vehicle that used for delivering small packages and standard packages Transfer only one package per trip. Collects only SmallPackage and StandardPackage.
